Department: Saw Swee Hock School Of Public Health
ModuleDescription:
This module will cover major topics in healthcare analytics,
including clinical related analytics (diseases, medication,
laboratory test, etc.) and healthcare operations related
analytics (resource planning/scheduling, care process
analytics and improvement, admission and readmission,
etc.). Students will learn the insights of these different
healthcare analytics areas, and how to select the right
analytics techniques for these healthcare analytics
problems.
Prerequisite:
SPH5002 Public Health Research Methods; OR
CO5103 Quantitative Epidemiologic Methods
